detailLists: Led the start and setup of multiple projects using React.js. Established project structures, guided teams through development, and ensured timely delivery while following best practices.
Led the migration of the user interface and functionality to a new version of the dashboard portal.

Added and configured advanced features such as theming, user preferences, bulk actions, row pinning, file attachments, filter grouping, auto-refresh, and advanced search to enhance user experience and efficiency.
Designed and implemented request forms to manage data inputs and user interactions, including file attachments and data validation for efficient processing.
Introducing and integrating innovative features that significantly improved functionality, boosted performance, and increased user engagement and satisfaction.
Initiated and configured a React (TypeScript) project from scratch for OakNorth Bank's banking application, focusing on various key modules.
Developed modules for Authentication, Account Listing, Account Details, and customized filters, while also writing unit test cases for the application.
Led feature enhancements for a healthcare-based React.js application.
Initiated and configured security features for clinical trials within the React-based web application.
Developed various UI pages and modules for an IoT-based web application using Angular. Additionally, worked in a unit testing environment to ensure application quality.
Organized and conducted skill-based training sessions for interns and junior developers.
Designed a variety of UX templates using Adobe XD, including a Google RFP proposal for a testing tool.
Responsible for project estimation, initialization, configuration, and delivery.
Provided support and maintenance for an online community-based web application, implementing new features developed using React.
Concentrated on developing reusable JavaScript plugins and React components for a product-based e-marking web application platform.
Created wireframes and prototypes to introduce new feature UIs, receiving positive feedback from the manager for delivering exceptional work in a short timeframe.
Developed a US-based job portal website, handling both the UI and backend using JavaScript, HTML, PHP, and MySQL.
Worked on various UI modules for a native mobile application built with Angular and Ionic frameworks.
Developed a CMS website on the WordPress platform, focusing on email templates, product details, and filters modules.
Created web templates, email templates, and marketing banners for a digital marketing platform that empowers businesses to enhance their digital presence.
